page.title: 10RELIGION
page.content: There is no church in the area so in order to attend church people have to travel to Largoward or Cameron churches. Both of these churches are Presbyterian (Church of Scotland). Other people in the area travel to St. Andrews to church. Our area is within Cameron Parish and is served by an assistant minister who is attached here from St. Leonards in St. Andrews on a yearly basis therefore, there is no continuity of minister in the parish. The assistant minister conducts services weekly in Cameron Church he is also Chaplain to the school and visits fortnightly. Roman Catholics have to travel into St. Andrews to attend their church.
